page.title: 18STORNOWAY SOUTH: JOB CENTRE
page.content: The{Job Centre}supplies jobs from the Butt of Lewis to Barra.In the{Western {Isles}there are currently{1838}people unemployed.That is made up of{1329}men and{509}women.The percentage for the Western Isles is{18.9%.}The biggest employer is the{Western Isles Council. The others are the{Health Board,}the {Harris Tweed Industry}and{Lewis {Offshore ltd. The Job Centre supplies about 1000 jobs a year and sends a copy of jobs in the daily papers to{Barra, Uist}and all the other islands in the region, so that other people can see what is available. In the past 10 years employment has increased in areas like{Oil Rig {Fabrication}and{Local Government. There has been a decrease in opportunities in{Fishing}and related jobs and the Merchant Navy
